document.full_text: the obama administration on wednesday forcefully defended the killing of al qaeda leader osama bin laden by u.s. military forces as an act of national self defense and said that he made no attempt to surrender.
document.title: bin laden killing was u.s. self-defense: attorney general
lines_and_colors: the obama administration on wednesday forcefully defended the killing of al qaeda leader osama bin laden by u.s. military forces as an act of national self defense and said that he made no attempt to surrender.
